short_summary: Supply Arrangements for Environmental Remediation Services
description: The Supply Arrangements will have three separate Streams as defined in Annex E – Administrative Zones: The supplier is to indicate services for any one or both of the following three (3) Streams:",
full_summary:
**Environmental Remediation Services - Request for Supply Arrangement**
==============================================================

### Notice Details

* **Abbreviation**: EQ447-222370 A
* **Classification Code**: Environmental rehabilitation
* **Notice Type**: Request for Supply Arrangement (RfSA)
* **Language**: English and French
* **Publication Date**: September 20, 2022
* **Closing Date**: November 15, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Status**: Expired

### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenders for Environmental Remediation Services under a Supply Arrangement. There are three separate Streams:

*   Stream 1: Ontario Region
*   Stream 2: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   Stream 3: Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB)

The Supply Arrangements will be valid for an indefinite period, subject to periodic refreshes of prequalified suppliers. The Government anticipates a total value of approximately $17,000,000.00.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

*   Cindy Marshall (elle-la-lui / she-her-hers)
*   Phone: Not provided
*   Email: [cindy.marshall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:cindy.marshall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Important Links

You can find the notice at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14063354?extsite=MTQwNjMzNTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

The tenders will be evaluated on the basis of variations or combinations of the following methods:

*   Variations or combinations of the above methods
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*
